name: Red Eye Don't Cry
description:
Red Eye Don't Cry is a space bomb game made by FoxMiao.

Save the space!

The goal is simple, find bombs on one station, and put it on the eye three times.

For the movement, you can push:

 "W" and "S" to go forward and backward.

"A" and "s" to turn left and right.

"Space" for a quick stop.

"R" and "ESC" for replay the game and quitting the game.

There are two gas station, hold "A" or "S" to get gas.

Thank you for playing my game.
